system.effect: The Character is a master manipulator, they may attempt to seduce an NPC into becoming dependant on them. This requires the Character to defeat the NPC in a social confrontation and then offer them some kind of addictive substance they have access to. NPC must have a lower Infamy and not have Touched by the Fates trait, or be categorised as a "Master", or immune by GM Fiat (such as having From Beyond or Machine Trait). This seduced NPC does not count towards the character's Minion Limit.
